## XChaCha20Poly1305.encrypt() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
static encrypt(options: {
        additionalData?: Uint8Array;
        data: Uint8Array;
        key: Uint8Array;
        nonce: Uint8Array;
    }): Promise<{
        ciphertext: Uint8Array;

    }>;
```
